about_the_game:
Welcome to Happyhills, the town where you can indulge your deepest desires, make your wildest dreams come true, and slaughter anyone in your path. In this case, all three of these are the same.

Play as a stylish 80's style slasher and kill your way through different levels. The game offers 20 completely varied levels, each with an entirely different playstyle and way of killing. Do you like a challenge? Don't worry. The game wil increase in difficulty with every level, not every victim is as easy as the other. From a simple sleeping man in his armchair to fighting off a gang of bikers in a bar.

And don't think for a minute you can carry out these heinous acts without an ambitious detective on your back.

The game features:

  • 20 varied levels with each a different approach, different murder weapons and puzzle elements.

  • Mixed gameplay of stealth, action, horror and puzzle solving.

  • A twisted story with revealing motivations.

  • Numerous interesting characters to kill or to love.

  • Crime solving sub-levels as a detective.

  • Tons of dark humor and horror movie references.

  • Lots of gore and guts.

content_descriptors.notes:
The entire game is full of violence, gore and murder, since you are playing as the killer.
The style is cartoony, however the acts of violence could be shocking for some users. There are depictions of mutilation, slow murder, sadism, burning alive, decapitation and impaling.

Next to that, there are references to smoking and pedophilia.
The latter only in text.
